text: a sports car from the safety minded
folks at Volvo what'll they think of
next
hi I'm Jerry Garrett a contributor for
the New York Times here at the LA Auto
Show
you know the c30 is not the first sports
car from Volvo it's just the first one
since the Nixon presidency the c30 wants
to play and have fun Volvo says it will
come with all kinds of accessories for
holding snowboards kayaks skis and the
like it will also feature some
interesting paint graphics and interior
colors will be powered by a 5 cylinder
turbocharged engine that should help it
compete in that booming segment they
call the hot hatchback it is nine inches
shorter though it is built on the same
platform as the s4 t sedan that should
make it more maneuverable more fun to
drive and not to mention easier to park
Volvo says it hopes the c30 will be a
wake up call for its lagging sales think
of this e30 is something like mixing a
little strong Swedish coffee in with
your decaf for the New York Times
I'm Jerry Garrett
